metadata.title: CVE-2024-27074 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  media: go7007: fix a memleak in go7007_load_encoder  In go7007_load_encoder, bounce(i.e. go->boot_fw), is allocated without a deallocation thereafter. After the following call chain:  saa7134_go7007_init   |-> go7007_boot_encoder         |-> go7007_load_encoder   |-> kfree(go)  go is freed and thus bounce is leaked.
